description: It's nice to have servants when on vacation although Brooke wasn't working out that well for me, especially when she spills my drink! I strip her, tie her and weight her down before throwing her in the pool. I decide she needs more training in order to keep her job and tie her in a very difficult splits position; she suffers and she cums, she takes it all but I'm not done yet so I spread her out in the jacuzzi; dunk and fuck, dunk and fuck...that's the new game I make her play. Lastly I arch her back over a wheel, so strict, so exposed...so perfect!
title: Brooke Bound
